price: donde no podrá morir [para descansar del sufrimiento] ni vivir [sin dolor].
arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
